### Tender Notice
#### Request for Standing Offer - Laundry Services

The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Department of National Defence invites proposals from qualified contractors for the provision of laundry and drycleaning services as and when requested during the period of the Standing Offer.

**Property and Location**
Laundry and drycleaning services shall be provided to Canadian Forces College (CFC), 215 Yonge Blvd, Toronto, ON M5M 3H9 and Denison Armoury, 1 Yukon Lane, Toronto, ON M3K 0A1.

**Term and Period**
The term of the Standing Offer will commence on **June 1, 2023**, and continue for one year with one additional one-year option year.

**Timeline**
* The deadline for bidder submission and all required supporting documentation is **2:00 PM EDT on April 12, 2023**.
* Late bids will not be accepted, as the tender is subject to the provisions of the **Federal Progressive Taxation Act (FPSA-PT)**, which states that all bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Selection Criteria**
The lowest-priced bid will be used as the preference criteria for award selection.

**Contact Information**
* For all technical and contractual questions, contact:
    * Judy (SPAC/PSPC), contracting authority, via email at [judy.holt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:judy.holt@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement if it is in the best interest to do so, in line with the **Public Procurement Review Board (PRB)** guidelines.
